instructions: BlackBerry 10 : In the BlackBerry Hub or the Phone app, touch and hold a voicemail message. BlackBerry 7 or older : In the Visual Voicemail app , touch and hold a voicemail message. Tap Save As . Select the location, and tap Save .

Go to My T-Mobile and log in to your account. Click Phone > Check Voicemail . Log into your Digits account. Click Settings > Voicemail to email . Click Voicemail to email (on the left). Click Turn on next to Voicemail to email . Follow the onscreen prompts.
